Great PC classic would recommend playing to get a feel of the good ole 90's
If you like Classic games made for Steam and Valve in general then Half Life is the action packed game for you to get!!!!
One of the best games ever made.

Este juego naci√≥ el mismo a√±o que yo as√≠ que empezamos con buen pie.

Tonter√≠as aparte, Half-Life es un antes y un despu√©s en los FPS. Rompi√≥ con todo el a√±o que sali√≥, y es gracias a este juego que Valve es la empresa que es hoy y es en parte responsable de que exista Steam.

Su historia es brutal. Las armas son originales, los enemigos emblem√°ticos, Gordon Freeman se ha convertido en una leyenda de los videojuegos. 

Es un juego que, por mucho tiempo que pase, parece que envejece bien. 
Es muy divertido de jugar, un poco dif√≠cil al final pero bastante entretenido.

Great game, I never played half life nor any mods or anything like that.  Honestly half life was a bit before my time (I was born in 2002) so I never got into the franchise, but recently I thought maybe it was worth checking out and I'm glad I did.  It's really different from most fps games nowadays and I'm kinda shocked it was made so long ago considering how good it is.  The graphics and audio obviously are a little dated but everything else is pretty spot on.  One thing I didn't like was how much story you can miss if you aren't paying close attention.
Really good game but I feel like it drags on a bit towards the end.
FUN ZOMBIE GAME FUN ZOMBIE GAME FUN ZOMBIE GAME FUN ZOMBIE GAME
This is truly a timeless masterpiece, with brilliant storytelling, level design and combat.

It was such a good game compared to the time it was out. Still playable
please don't enable widescreen it's nearly impossible to fix

I don't think you need to hear me say that Half Life is a masterpiece. It's one of the most important fps games of all time. Valve's first game did things that everyone thought would be stupid, but they showed that it clearly wasnt. Half Life created environmental story telling if you ask me and it was done so well. Without Half Life, we wouldnt have games like Halo, Call of Duty and... Half Life 2. This game is a must for any fps or game fan as a whole. Only reccomendation is play this before Black Mesa and skip HL Source it's terrible.
pioneer in gaming but i just like killing the civilians

Para ser honesto nunca en mi vida hab√≠a jugado un Half Life ya que no me toc√≥ tener esa experiencia y no tuve esa oportunidad, fu√≠ mas allegado a t√≠tulos como DOOM, Duke Nukem 3D y otros. Ahora que lo he terminado puedo entender de que lo llamaban "la leyenda de los shooters en primera persona". Buenos graficos para ser un juego de los 90 llegando a los a√±os 2000. Tiene un gameplay muy bueno y una banda sonora hermosa. Aunque haya jugado antes el Half Life 2 no me rest√≥ nada a la experiencia de juego, es m√°s, ahora puedo entender toda la historia xD.
Se ha vuelto uno de mis juegos favoritos en este tiempo en lo que refiere a Shooters.
¬øQue si lo recomiendo?

great game
2nd one is better though

The game is pretty good and has a pretty okay story. Theres much exploration, riddles, and Combat. Most of the time its fun and it brought a lot to the gaming industry when it came out and the graphics are really good for when it came out.  I was stuck at many places and sometimes it got a bit frustriating or boring, but for the time it came out its a really solid game. I will now continue to play both of the DLCs, and then Half Life 2, Which seems to be way better than the first one, even thought this one is still good. HL2 also aged better.

There are so many reviews about this game telling you how great it is. This is another one. This game stands the test of time. I played it when it first came out. I've played it a few times since. I'm gonna start playing it again. It just doesn't get old. Even the graphics are still amazing. This game, for me, is forever.
